title: How many King Rammus players (closed beta) are there in OCE?
body: Not many, if any. I would imagine. I joined this game with 3 mates at the time in 2009 and we are still playing. Ik we should give it up because we haven't got far at all, but the game is still one of my favorites. Id like to see how many are still playing. 1000? 100? 10?

replies.body: Are there any Riot employees from OCE who were closed beta players? Or they still in NA maybe?

Well the lolking id of someone who had just missed out on king rammus is 133738 so there were around 130000 beta players. Assuming the beta was mostly populated by english speakers and assuming the proportion of ranked players of each region is similar to the amount of beta players of each region gives oce around about 5330 beta players. So anywhere between 6 and 5330 players?
How did you find out how to get the ID on lolking?
From the various "How long have I played?" threads. It's just the number at the end of the url of a players profile so pretty obvious anyway
I've seen it twice or three times.
I've never seen it in 5 years of playing, so I'd assume very very few, league was never very popular back then so not a big surprise.
Both my accounts with it were permanently banned, theirs not many left to be honest.
Nice, there's one. Wonder how many more...
